html.main:
Simple Chart

A simple line and point plot of two separate series.

Javascript code

gexamples.sigmoid = {
    height: '80%',

    data: function (chart) {
        var X = d3.range(-5, 5, 0.5);

        return [chart.xyfunction(X, function (x) {
                    return 1/(1+Math.exp(-x));
                }),
                {point: chart.xyfunction(X, function (x) {
                    var d = 1/(1+Math.exp(-x));
                    return d*(1 - d);
                })}
                ];
    },

    // Callback for angular directive
    angular: function (chart, opts) {

        opts.scope.$on('formFieldChange', function (e, form, field) {
            if (field === 'type') {
                opts.type = form[field];
                chart.resume();
            }
        });
    }
};
